name: HRE Fast Castle
description: Uses [icon:monk] Prelate buffs to reach Castle Age rapidly. Focuses on [icon:relic] Relic control and heavy infantry.

steps.description: Send [icon:monk] Prelate to [icon:sheep] sheep. 6 starting villagers to sheep.
1st new [icon:villager] builds [icon:house] house, then rallies to [icon:gold] gold.
2nd, 3rd and 4th new [icon:villager] to [icon:gold] gold. Build [icon:mining_camp] Mining Camp.
5th and 6th new [icon:villager] to [icon:food] food. Total 8 on food.
[icon:feudal_age] Age up with [icon:landmark] Aachen Chapel! Build next to [icon:wood] wood and [icon:food] food.
Place [icon:monk] Prelate inside Aachen Chapel. Rally new villagers to [icon:wood] wood.
[icon:feudal_age] Feudal Age reached! Immediately transition 2 from food to [icon:gold] gold.
[icon:castle_age] Age up with [icon:landmark] Regnitz Cathedral! Use 4 builders.
[icon:monk] Produce Prelates to secure [icon:relic] Relics immediately upon aging up.
